scripts.build:tasks: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:tasks:noclean
scripts.build:tasks:noclean: npm run compile:tasks && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension:tasks
scripts.content:tasks: npm run content:tasks:scripts && npm run content:tasks:node
scripts.package:tasks: pushd dist && npm run clean:vsix && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json && popd
scripts.publish:tasks: pushd dist && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --share-with <ACCOUNT> --token <TOKEN> && popd
